todays featurefriday is the calgary search amp rescue association 
⁠

 --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
donation tips

1⃣  no expired goods
2⃣  only new and sealed nonperishables
3⃣  refrain from donating extra large nonperishables
4⃣  anything you can spare helps
5⃣  drop off at our calgary or edmonton offices or one of our dropoff locations

ableg
